Package org.robobrain.sdk.graphics

Class Summary
BitmapFont Draws text to the screen via OpenGL
Color The Color class encapsulates a 32bit RGBA color.
Rectangle Encapsulates a 2D Rectangle.
Renderable The base Renderable object.
SimpleSprite The simplest Renderable object.
Sprite An animated Renderable object.
TextSprite The TextSprite simply draws a String to the screen.
Texture Encapsulates an OpenGL texture.
TextureManager Manages the creation and destruction of OpenGL textures throughout their life-cycle.
